item.title: How to use this Hugo theme ?
item.description: Install Hugo and create a new site. See the Hugo documentation for details. hugo new site <name of site> cd <name of site> git init git submodule add https://github.com/binokochumolvarghese/lightbi-hugo themes/lightbi-hugo echo "theme = 'lightbi-hugo'" >> config.
